subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kyrie Irving will be sidelined for the next month with a broken left index finger, the latest injury to the N.B.A.’s reigning rookie of the year and a devastating blow to the rebuilding Cleveland Cavaliers.
snippet: Kyrie Irving will be sidelined for the next month with a broken left index finger, the latest injury to the N.B.A.’s reigning rookie of the year and a devastating blow to the rebuilding Cleveland Cavaliers.
